body_html:
@drpngx Thanks for the hint!

I noticed that the entry session_bundle/testdata/saved_model_half_plus_two doesn't exist (anymore).
This seems to be some kind of a consistency issue.

Do you think these entries could be put into a file separate from the code?
And would it be possible to programatically check them for validity?

body:
@drpngx Thanks for the hint!

I noticed that the entry `session_bundle/testdata/saved_model_half_plus_two` doesn't exist (anymore).
This seems to be some kind of a consistency issue.

Do you think these entries could be put into a file separate from the code?
And would it be possible to programatically check them for validity?
